actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Post Office and Civil Service.

committees.committee: House Post Office and Civil Service

official_title: A joint resolution to authorize the President of the United States to designate "National Ski Week".

summary.text: Authorizes and requests the President to designate the week beginning on the first Saturday after the first Tuesday in January of each year as "National Ski Week."

titles.title: A joint resolution to authorize the President of the United States to designate "National Ski Week".
